name: Thanksgiving Spinach Salad
author: J. Dub
summary: I serve this spinach salad every year for our Thanksgiving dinner. The flavor of the apples and cinnamon make it great for the season. It's very quick and easy to prepare, too!
ingredients: ¾ cup sweetened dried cranberries, chopped
1  McIntosh apple - peeled, cored, and diced
½ small red onion, finely chopped
1 (6 ounce) bag baby spinach, torn into bite-sized pieces
directions: Mix cranberries, apple, onion, lemon juice, honey, chili powder, and cinnamon together in a large bowl
Let rest for flavors to blend, about 20 minutes
Add spinach and toss to coat
